data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Moreira, Grazielle Furtado, Klompen, Hans, Moraes, Gilberto José De (2014): Redefinition of Cosmolaelaps Berlese (Acari: Laelapidae) and description of five new species from Brazil. Zootaxa 3764 (3): 317-346, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3764.3.4
